game.name: Eggventure
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Captions available, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Narrated Game Menus, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Eggventure is a 2D Metroidvania platformer where you play as Egbert, an egg on a mission to rescue his friends from becoming breakfast.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Eggventure is a 2D Metroidvania platformer where you play as Egbert, an egg on a mission to rescue his friends from becoming breakfast.
